We need limits for media companies. If they r lying/deceiving the ppl more than 1% of the time, if they r encouraging the public to send death threats or harm others in any way, if they don’t live in the country they r trying to destroy, they should be shut down and never allowed to own any media in the US again.

You still have a problem because those people are out here propagating lies in the work place covertly all over America. They are using falsified reports and articles trying keep momentum on the lies fox New and Trump propagate.
